With the release of the previous year's data, the MITUS model should be updated. Below is a list of model inputs and calibration targets that need to be updated annually. 

###Tuberculosis Specific Data by Source 
####OTIS
-    Total Cases 
-    Percent of Cases in the Non-US born 
-    Percent of Cases in recent Non-US born
-    Age Distribution of Cases by Nativity 
-    Percent of Cases in Homeless 
-    TB Deaths 

###Demography
####American Community Survey (ACS) table S0501
-    Total Population by Nativity 
-    Age Distribution of the Population (single year)  
####Mortality.org 
-    Total Mortality 
-    Age Distribution of Mortality 
-    Net Migration 

####Immigration Inputs (Nick)
-    Total Immigration by Year (Department of Homeland Security)
-    Prevalence of TB among Immigrants
